name: Transmute VR
description:
Spring 2018 Epic Game Jam Submission

A short VR game where the player uses clues to collect and combine objects and place these objects in a special chest

Gameplay Instructions

Review cards on bench.  Find items and add to cauldron to make missing items.  Add created items to chest to complete the game. 

Content created before Game Jam

One or two props from the following Marketplace asset packs

Animal Pack Ultra, Blacksmith Forge, Cardinal Gems, FX Star Starter Kit, Gold Nuggets, IBFPS Hands, Low Poly Forrest, Minerals Pack, Mushroom Pack, Old Alchemist 

Several props from the following Market place asset packs

Old Laboratory, Apothecary, Books Set, Old Kitchen 

Music from Tree Of Life asset pack

A few textures from Textures.com
